articles.title: Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Monday on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, and others.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy here were present there.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech at the reception that the Korean people have achieved great successes in socialist construction and in the efforts to achieve the country's reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Cuba will always remember the solidarity and firm support extended by the party, government and people of the DPRK to the Cuban people on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the revolution in Cuba, he noted.
					
					 He expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation for which Fidel Castro Ruz, Raul Castro Ruz and Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il have shown deep concern would grow stronger in various fields. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech said that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA was a historic event of fundamental significance in strengthening and developing the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK and accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 He said that the Korean people are pleased with the successes made by the Cuban people in their struggle for the development of the country, adhering to the revolutionary principle under the uplifted banner of socialism. 
					
					 The Korean people will make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the Cuban people in the future, too, he stressed.

articles.title: Day of Victorious Cuban Revolution Marked
articles.content:
Day of Victorious Cuban Revolution Marked
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government Monday arranged a meeting to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 On hand were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education who is chairman of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin noted in a speech at the meeting that the Cuban people waged an armed struggle five decades ago to put an end to the pro-U.S. dictatorial rule and built a socialist system guaranteeing genuine freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					 The friendly relations between the DPRK and Cuba are developing with each passing day under the deep care of the leaders of the two countries, he said.
					
					 The peoples of the two countries have struggled shoulder to shoulder for the victory of the socialist cause while smashing the U.S. imperialists' aggression and interference and ceaseless economic blockade, he noted, adding that the Korean people would as ever stand together with the Cuban people in the struggle for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano recalled that the Cuban revolutionaries and people overturned the pro-U.S. dictatorial regime and built a genuine people's power.
					
					 Over the past years the Cuban people have achieved great successes though they have suffered not a small loss due to the imperialists' vicious blockade and natural disasters, he said.
					
					 The relations of friendship between Cuba and the DPRK have grown stronger through visits of delegations at different levels this year, he noted, wishing the heroic Korean people great success in their efforts in the new year.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 98 (2009). 
					 They were handed to an official concerned on Monday by Enrique Gomez Soler, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy here who is the doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Working People of DPRK Called upon to Bring about New Great Surge
articles.content:
Working People of DPRK Called upon to Bring about New Great Surge
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex held a rally of the employees on Dec. 28 to vow to bring about a new great revolutionary surge in hearty response to the instructions given by General Secretary Kim Jong Il during his on-site guidance to the complex and adopted a letter to the working people across the country.
					 On Dec. 24 Kim Jong Il visited Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement, and lit a torch to bring about a new great surge to be recorded as another landmark event in the history of the country.
					
					They in the letter renewed their firm determination to take the lead in the on-going all-out charge and demonstrate the spirit of Chollima, the mettle of the workers in Kangson once again. They ardently challenged all other working people throughout the country to a high-pitched drive for effecting a great upswing in wholehearted response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The WPK set a gigantic target to fling open the gate of a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the letter noted, stressing that bringing about a great surge at present provides a shortcut to victory.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK has already occupied the position of a political, ideological and military power, the letter underscored the need to build an economic power.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The present struggle to attain the high goal of an economic power is a deep-going struggle as crucial as the battle to defend the country from the imperialist aggression.
					
					 Four years are left till 2012.
					
					 Chollima Korea emerged a socialist state by bringing about a great surge in the 1950s of the last century. We should turn Songun Korea into a great prosperous and powerful nation in the near future by effecting a new great surge in the 21st century.
					
					 There is no fortress unconquerable for the DPRK as long as the seasoned and tested leadership is provided by the Party and all the servicepersons and people are single-mindedly united and the DPRK has matchless armed forces and the tremendous potential of the independent national economy.
					
					 The letter noted that to effect a great upswing at present represents a do-or-die struggle for devotedly safeguarding Kim Jong Il, the destiny of the country, and defending socialism and a drive for bringing about a great surge in the technological revolution and modernization.
					
					 It called upon the working people across the country to launch an all-people grand march for flinging open the gate of a great prosperous and powerful nation by 2012 in a bid to intensify the movement for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge and hold higher with increased courage the banner of self-reliance.
					
					 To create something new and advanced our own way is the mode of advance to be adhered to in the present movement for effecting a new great upswing and a key to victory, the letter noted, adding: "Let us demonstrate the mettle of Koreans in the building of a great prosperous powerful nation!" This is the call of the Party and our militant banner.

articles.title: Miru Plain Changes Its Appearance
articles.content:
Miru Plain Changes Its Appearance
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The area of Miru Plain in the central part of the Korea is putting on a new look.
					This year paddy and non-paddy fields of about 2,000 hectares have been rezoned into large-sized ones for mechanization and the gravity-fed waterway project is progressing at the final stage.
					
					Huge earthen waterway reminding people of big canal is at the stage of completion in the main in the section of tens of miles.
					
					The project of a huge earthen dam of Phyongam Reservoir has been carried out and projects of aqueduct tunnels extending scores of kilometers and hundreds of structures have been completed or are drawing near completion.
					
					Many hukbosan fertilizer factories have been erected in work-teams of co-op farms in the plain and hundreds of rural dwellings and public buildings constructed, radically sprucing up looks of villages.
					
					A campaign for arranging a stockbreeding base in each work-team has been undertaken in recent years with the result that dozens of bases have been constructed and one hundred and scores of bases are on the point of completion.
					
					The co-op farms in Miru Plain have brought about changes by creating shelterbelts in one hundred and scores of kilometer sections and ornamental forests in the areas of hundreds of hectares and doing other projects this year.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Tyranny under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Tyranny under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group recently held a trial at the "Seoul High Court" at which it upheld the decision made at the first hearing and sentenced Yun Ki Jin, chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification, to three years in jail and three years in suspension of qualification on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is nothing but an outrageous fascist tyranny as it is aimed at quelling the aspiration and desire of the south Korean youth and students and people for independent reunification.
					
					 The Lee group is incriminating the just activities of Yun who disseminated the Juche idea among students and asserted the reunification through an alliance with the north. This is an unwarranted action to escalate the north-south confrontation and suppress and destroy the forces for reunification and democracy.
					
					 Such shameless far-fetched assertion can be made only by the traitors hell-bent on inciting confrontation with the DPRK among the south Korean people and blocking national reunification. The Lee group deserves a stern punishment as it has incriminated the activities for reunification and patriotism and brutally cracked down upon them at the point of bayonet. 
					
					 No one can predict what horrible human rights abuses will be committed in south Korea by the Lee group who knows nothing but brandishing swords as it is utterly indifferent to the country and the nation, ethics and morality.
					
					 It is the height of folly for those wicked group without an equal in the world to talk about someone's "human rights issue," feeling unashamed. This is as reckless an act as trying to paint the blue sky black.
					
					 The Lee group should release at once all the unreasonably detained patriots including Yun Ki Jin and stop brandishing bayonets against the people if it does not want to meet the same miserable end as its predecessors did while going mad with the fascist suppression of guiltless people.

articles.title: Removal of Concrete Wall Called for
articles.content:
Removal of Concrete Wall Called for
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The concrete wall should be dismantled as soon as possible and the criminal moves of the anti-reunification forces for inter-Korean confrontation checked in the June 15 era of reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed article carried in this regard;
					
					 There appeared another wall for inter-Korean confrontation surpassing the concrete wall in south Korea severely hampering the struggle of the Korean nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea is desperately kicking up anti-DPRK confrontational racket swimming against the trend of the times instead of pulling down the concrete wall which runs counter to the reality of the June 15 era of reunification, thus building higher the wall for inter-Korean confrontation. 
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the Lee group is not only the group of worst traitors in the world little different from those military dictators in the past who pursued national division and inter-Korean confrontation after building up a concrete wall but the one of unpardonable traitors desperately trying to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last with a political barrier for inter-Korean confrontation higher than the concrete wall.
					
					 It is talking such nonsensical watchwords as "co-existence and co-prosperity", "sincerity" and "dialogue" as if they are interested in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. If it were true, they should remove all sorts of barriers inciting inter-Korean confrontation such as the concrete wall and the "National Security Law", give up anachronistic anti-DPRK policy of confrontation including "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and take practical measures for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed by the north and south of Korea, far from paying lip-service to "dialogue". 
					
					It is nothing but hypocrisy, in fact, to vociferate about "dialogue" in disregard of them. It will only betray criminal intention sought by it to maintain the said walls against fellow countrymen and realize its sinister intention.
					
					 The Lee group can never veil its treacherous nature as a criminal running wild to realize its ambition to invade the north, intensifying inter-Korean confrontation.

articles.title: Education Authorities' Inhuman Actions Assailed in South Korea
articles.content:
Education Authorities' Inhuman Actions Assailed in South Korea
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) --16 human rights and youth and children organizations including the youth and children human rights activists' network held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 22 at which they disclosed the inhuman actions perpetrated by the education authorities against primary and middle school pupils.
					 Speakers at the conference recalled that shortly ago the education authorities perpetrated such inhuman acts as instructing those primary and middle schools to close the doors of their entrance halls to bar the teachers affiliated to the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) of south Korea from entering them after being ordered to retire or being fired from those schools on charges of their protest against the unreasonable educational policy and detaining in classrooms those pupils of whom they had taken charge. 
					
					They accused the school authorities of putting pressure upon the parents of students not to allow them to take part in assemblies and demonstrations and, at the same time, suppressing those students who protested the unreasonable educational policy.
					
					 They held that the above-said teachers are not guilty, urging the school management side to let the students express their legitimate will and refrain from cracking down upon the protest against the unreasonable educational  policy.
					
					 At the end of the conference the organizations submitted a written petition which containing their demands to the "Human Rights Committee."

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flayed
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting on the situation took place in Seoul on December 23 to denounce the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to revive dictatorship under the sponsorship of the People's Council for People's Life and Democracy of south Korea, a solidarity organization opposing puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 Speakers at the meeting accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Grand National Party" of working hard to railroad evil bills of various kinds threatening the vital rights of the people through the "National Assembly."
					
					 Recalling that students and their parents are out in their protests against the measures to force teachers affiliated to the "National Teachers Union" to retire and fire them, they felt resentful against the Lee Myung Bak "government" keen on the unreasonable educational policy.
					
					 The "government" and the ruling party are hell-bent on retrogressively revising seven evil laws on media in a bid to blindfold the eyes of the people and stop their ears, they said, adding that voices denouncing the unilateral "state administration" of the Lee Myung Bak "government" are growing stronger than ever before.
					
					 A resolution read out at the meeting said that the south Korean society is finding itself in a more deplorable and serious emergency situation than any period of the modern history.
					
					 It called upon the people from all walks of life to unite as one and struggle against Lee Myung Bak regardless of ideology and political views.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk Lauded
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus, made public a statement on December 23 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Kim Jong Il is a great brilliant commander possessed of tested political quality and peculiar military leadership art, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has further bolstered up the People's Army and reliably defended the sovereignty of the country and the gains of socialism, holding high the banner of Songun to cope with the changed international environment and tense situation.
					
					 Thanks to his wise guidance and Songun politics the Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army strong in idea and faith which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The reality proves that Kim Jong Il is the most distinguished brilliant commander of the present times who has led the army and the people along the road of certain victory with his matchless grit and pluck at a time when no one in the world dares stand up against the U.S.
					
					 December 24 is the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk who gave birth to and brought up Kim Jong Il as the sun of the future.
					
					 The self-sacrificing spirit Kim Jong Suk displayed in protecting President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life is arousing the admiration of progressive humankind.
					
					 Her brilliant life and activities are an example to be followed by all the women in the world.

articles.title: Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Commemorated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Commemorated in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Pakistani preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2009 was held in Karachi on Dec. 22.
					At the ceremony the minister of Social Welfare of the Government of Sind State was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events including meeting, seminar and photo exhibition from February 5 to April 25.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio una funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					Cuando el Dirigente se dirigia al palco del teatro, todos los espectadores le acogieron hospitalariamente con estruendosas aclamaciones de "!Viva!" rindiendo el maximo honor a el quien encendio la antorcha del nuevo gran auge revolucionario para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera y trabaja incansablemente al frente de esta empresa.
					
					Los artistas de esa banda presentaron en la escena las musicas orquestales "Cielo azul de mi pais", "Arirang", "Morambong", "Abundante cosecha en la llanura Chongsan", etc.
					
					A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes elogiaron en tono patetico con su diestra interpretacion artistica el temperamento heroico de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Igualmente, a traves de su fascinante y original funcion que hace probar profundamente la idiosincrasia coreana y lo sentimental de la musica orquestal, mostraron la grandeza de la musica nacional de Corea y la autoctona sinfonia que llegaron al maximo nivel.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente felicito los exitos de la funcion respondiendo con su mano alzada a los ejecutantes y espectadores, que le aclamaban con entusiasmo.
					
					Destacando que nuestra sinfonia autoctona recorre la senda del vertiginoso desarrollo llegando a su apogeo en la actual epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), aprecio altamente los meritos de los creadores y artistas de dicha entidad artistica que lucharon abnegadamente por cumplir cabalmente la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de desarrollar al estilo coreano la sinfonia conforme al gusto y sentimientos del pueblo coreano.
					
					Subrayando que la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional, integrada por los talentosos directores, creadores e concertistas, es la de talla mundial en todos los aspectos como el tamano, el nivel cualitativo e interpretativo de los instrumentos, apunto que es un orgullo de nuestro pueblo tener a este revolucionario conjunto artistico de larga historia y mucho prestigio.
					
					Apunto que se debe satisfacer la cada dia mas creciente demanda cultural del pueblo coreano al situar la sinfonia en una etapa mas alta de acuerdo con la exigencia del nuevo siglo e indico las tareas pragmaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar mas la autoctona sinfonia.
					
					 Le acompanaron en disfrutarla los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Kim Yang Gon, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Chol, Ri Je Gang, Kim Kyong Ok y Ri Jae Il, el presidente del Comite Nacional de Radio y Television de Corea, Cha Sung Su, y otros cuadros directivos, asi como los generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad No.1017 de Fuerzas Aereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad No.1017 de Fuerzas Aereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Unidad No. 1017 de las Fuerzas Aereas del EPC, laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					 Entre sus acompanantes figuraban el general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Kim Myong Guk, y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo fue acogido en el terreno por el comandante de las Fuerzas Aereas del EPC, Ri Pyong Chol, y otros generales, asi como los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					 Ante todo, el recorrio los aviones visitados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Dijo que esta unidad, que bajo la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente, recorrio la unica senda victoriosa y gloriosa, es la benemerita que contribuyo en gran medida al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas aereas de nuestro pais y senalo que ella debe dar firme continuidad a sus brillantes tradiciones de lucha.
					
					 Despues de enterarse del estado del cumplimiento de la mision de guardia por la unidad, presencio los ejercicios de los aviadores.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la unidad preparo firmemente a todos los pilotos como combatientes del cielo dispuestos a estallarse como bombas y balas y esta lista siempre para repeler con audacia la acometida en cualquier momento de los enemigos observando con aguda vigilancia revolucionaria las maniobras de agresion de los imperialistas, y presento las tareas que se presentan para incrementar la combatividad de la unidad
					
					 Al reunirse con el heroe de la Republica, Ho Ryong, escucho su historia de combates y volvio a evaluar altamente sus meritos diciendo que el es aviador sumamente valiente que creo un prodigio sorprendente con su invencible coraje e ingeniosos metodos combativos.
					
					 Destacando que todos los aviadores orgullosos de Corea son los fuertes en la conviccion y la ideologia, que estan colmados del noble espiritu de sacrificio y del calido patriotismo para dedicar con gusto su juventud y vida a la defensa de la patria, subrayo que nuestro pais es la fortaleza inexpugnable porque estas filas de los fieles defienden fidedignamente el cielo azul de la patria.
					
					 A continuacion, el Dirigente recorrio el dormitorio, el comedor, la cocina y otros lugares de la unidad atendiendo con afecto paternal la labor y la vida de los aviadores.
					
					 Evaluo los esfuerzos de los comandantes de la unidad, muy contento de que ellos facilitaron excelentes condiciones de vida a los pilotos a traves de las instalaciones de intendencia bien acondicionadas.
					
					 El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los uniformados de la unidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita Comandancia de la Unidad No. 323 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita Comandancia de la Unidad No. 323 del EPC
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Comandancia de la Unidad No.323 del EPC, laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup, en ocasion del Dia de la Constitucion. 
					 Guiado por el jefe de la Unidad, el Dirigente recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					 Senalando que bajo la sabia direccion y esmerada atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, esta Unidad crecio y se fortalecio como invencibles filas de combate, encomendo que guarden siempre en el corazon la inmensa benevolencia dispensada por el Presidente a ella.
					
					 Aprecio altamente los meritos de la unidad diciendo que esta tiene la tradicion de haber acatado siempre en la delantera la direccion del Songun del Partido siendo modelo de todo el ejercito en los ejercicios combativos y politicos y desplegando el heroismo masivo en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					
					 En el aula de leccion militar y el salon deportivo se entero de la marcha de los ejercicios y vio un entrenamiento de los militares.
					
					 Muy complacido de que todos los oficiales y soldados crecieron como combatientes capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos y cumplen magnificamente su mision de combate con la ferrea decision de defender a costa de la vida el regimen socialista de nuestro pais centrado en las masas populares, indico las tareas que se presentan para agrandar notablemente la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					 Al recorrer las instalaciones de cultura y educacion, se cercioro del estado de la labor politica sobre los militares.
					
					 Elogio a la unidad por formar a todos los militares como los fuertes en la ideologia al preparar excelentemente las instalaciones de cultura y educacion y desarrollar de manera ofensiva diversas labores politicas, en particular, por haberlos convertido en entusiastas lectores implantando el clima de leer.
					
					 Senalo que es preciso establecer el modo revolucionario de estudio entre los militares y elevar la tasa de uso de los libros para que ellos lean mucho los libros e instruyo detalladamente los remedios para este fin.
					
					 Durante el recorrido por los establecimientos de intendencia y otros lugares de la Unidad, presto profunda atencion a la vida de los militares.
					
					 Por ultimo, se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad.
					
					 El Dirigente fue acompanado por el general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Kim Myong Guk, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, asi como los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En el  juicio realizado recientemente en la "corte de apelacion de Seul", la banda de Lee Myung Bak sentencio tres anos de prision y el mismo periodo de suspension de calificacion igual que el resultado del primer juicio contra Yun Ki Jin, presidente de la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, en virtud de la violacion de la "ley de seguridad".
					 Tal sentencia fascista pisotea la aspiracion de los jovenes, estudiantes y otros habitantes del Sur de Corea a la reunificacion independiente.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 29 y continua:
					
					 Esa banda cuestiona las justas actividades de Yun quien propago la idea Juche a los estudiantes e insistio en la reunificacion con el Norte de Corea, lo cual es un pretexto para agravar la confrontacion Norte-Sur y reprimir las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion.
					
					 Tal atrocidad la pueden perpetrar solo los traidores que recurren locamente a las maquinaciones para inculcar la conciencia de enfrentamiento contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea entre los habitantes surcoreanos e impedir la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 La banda de Lee debe ser castigada por el respecto.
					
					 Pero, ella habla del "problema de DDHH" de alguien. Esto deviene la cuspide del cinismo y un absurdo acto.
					
					Si la banda de Lee no quiere repetir tal vergonzosa historia de sus antecesores arruinados al cabo de reprimir de manera fascista a los habitantes inocentes, debe excarcelar de inmediato al joven Yun Ki Jin y otros patriotas injustamente arrestados y abandonar su represion contra los habitantes.
